newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Oak Technology starts.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Oak Technology starts.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said on Thursday analysts Rob Chaplinsky and Miles Kan had raised their rating for Oak Technology Inc to strong buy from hold.
-- In a report, the analysts said CD-ROM controller demand and pricing continued to be strong.

-- "Although the company would benefit from more diversification, our confidence level in (the company's) core CD-ROM controller franchise is increasing, and we believe the stock is undervalued at today's prices," they wrote.
-- The company's shares were up 1-13/16 to 13-7/8 in mid-morning trade.
